name: FetchHubspotRecords
description:
Retrieve HubSpot CRM records by ID or custom property.

This tool retrieves records from HubSpot CRM using either a record ID or a custom unique value property. It should be called when you need to access specific CRM records based on these identifiers.

parameters.name: retrieve_records_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object for specifying record retrieval by ID, custom property, and desired properties. Includes 'idProperty' to use a custom unique property, 'inputs' for record IDs, 'properties' for desired record properties, and 'propertiesWithHistory' if history is required.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

parameters.name: return_archived_records_only
parameters.description: Set to true to return only HubSpot CRM records that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
